aws::graph::propositions: Risk Factors in Amazon's SEC Filing
Please carefully consider significant factors, events, and uncertainties that make an investment in Amazon's securities risky.
The events and consequences discussed in Amazon's risk factors could have a material adverse effect on Amazon's business.
The events and consequences discussed in Amazon's risk factors could have a material adverse effect on Amazon's growth.
The events and consequences discussed in Amazon's risk factors could have a material adverse effect on Amazon's reputation.
The events and consequences discussed in Amazon's risk factors could have a material adverse effect on Amazon's prospects.
The events and consequences discussed in Amazon's risk factors could have a material adverse effect on Amazon's financial condition.
The events and consequences discussed in Amazon's risk factors could have a material adverse effect on Amazon's operating results.
The events and consequences discussed in Amazon's risk factors could have a material adverse effect on components of Amazon's financial results.
The events and consequences discussed in Amazon's risk factors could have a material adverse effect on Amazon's cash flows.
The events and consequences discussed in Amazon's risk factors could have a material adverse effect on Amazon's liquidity.
The events and consequences discussed in Amazon's risk factors could have a material adverse effect on Amazon's stock price.
The material adverse effects could occur in circumstances Amazon may or may not be able to accurately predict.
The material adverse effects could occur in circumstances Amazon may or may not be able to recognize.
The material adverse effects could occur in circumstances Amazon may or may not be able to control.
Amazon's risk factors do not identify all risks that Amazon faces.
Amazon's operations could also be affected by factors that are not presently known to Amazon.
Amazon's operations could also be affected by events that are not presently known to Amazon.
Amazon's operations could also be affected by uncertainties that are not presently known to Amazon.
Amazon's operations could also be affected by factors that Amazon currently does not consider to present significant risks to Amazon's operations.
Amazon's operations could also be affected by events that Amazon currently does not consider to present significant risks to Amazon's operations.
Amazon's operations could also be affected by uncertainties that Amazon currently does not consider to present significant risks to Amazon's operations.

text:
### Item 1A - Risk Factors

Please carefully consider the following discussion of significant factors, events, and uncertainties that make an investment in our securities risky. The events and consequences discussed in these risk factors could, in circumstances we may or may not be able to accurately predict, recognize, or control, have a material adverse effect on our business, growth, reputation, prospects, financial condition, operating results (including components of our financial results), cash flows, liquidity, and stock price. These risk factors do not identify all risks that we face; our operations could also be affected by factors, events, or uncertainties that are not presently known to us or that we currently do not consider to present significant risks to our operations.
